title: Cherry, Pistachio, Cardamom Kombucha Smoothie
description: A unique blend of flavor, with the probiotic help of kombucha.
dietaryInterests: Low Sodium, Gluten-Free, Vegetarian, Low Calorie, Mediterranean, Heart Friendly, Nutritarian
ingredients: 1 ½ cups ginger kombucha, or any flavor
directions: Place all ingredients into the Vitamix container in the order listed and secure the lid.
Start the blender on its lowest speed, then quickly increase to its highest speed. Blend for 1 minute 20 seconds, using the tamper to push ingredients toward the blades.
